events.message: The customer reported that their car was involved in a collision with another vehicle at the intersection, resulting in significant damage.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of the insured vehicle in the collision.
An agent specializing in auto claims has been assigned to handle this case and coordinate next steps with the claimant.
The claim was officially acknowledged and the customer was informed about the process and expected timelines.
The customer was requested to submit photos of the vehicle damage, police reports, and insurance documents for further processing.
The claimant submitted all required documents including the accident report, photos of the damaged car, and their driving license.
The investigation team has begun reviewing the details of the accident along with submitted reports and third party statements.
The investigation concluded that the insured driver was not at fault and the claim will proceed to settlement.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the repair costs of the damaged vehicle as documented by the repair estimate.
The customer responded positively to the settlement amount and appreciated the timely communication from the agent.
The claim was formally approved for payment following the customer's acceptance of the proposed settlement offer.
The settlement payment was issued directly to the customer’s account covering all authorized repair expenses.
The claim has been closed successfully with confirmation that the customer’s vehicle repairs have been completed.
All case files and documentation for this auto accident claim have been archived according to company retention policies.
